frontend.interfaces

Interface ItemHandler

  • All Superinterfaces:
    java.io.Serializable
    All Known Implementing Classes:
    AbstractHandler, CircleBottomLeftHandler, CircleBottomRightHandler, CircleTopLeftHandler, CircleTopRightHandler, LineEndHandler, LineOriginHandler

    public interface ItemHandler
extends java.io.Serializable
    Handler for the Items Handler are used to resize the Items
    Author:
    zannc2 & gfells4
